divs: Sighting DetailsIt was amazing all three of us saw them- lights that broke off - red and white and they would go backwards, forwards, appear disappear.Not connected fully in appearance spatially to regular time and space.They looked like jumbly areas of flashing red and white lights
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lebanon
There were no other sightings in Lebanon on or around July 12th 2013
